message.name: SIN_NUMBER_NOT_VALID
message.locale: The SIN number entered is not a valid number. Please check and enter a valid SIN number

message.name: END_DATE_EXISTING_SIN
message.locale: An active SIN number is present in the system. Please end date the existing SIN number before adding a new SIN number

message.name: END_DATE_MUST_BE_TODAY_OR_DATE_IN_THE_PAST
message.locale: End Date must be today or a date in the past

message.name: START_DATE_MUST_BE_TODAY_OR_THE_PAST
message.locale: Start Date must be today or a date in the past

message.name: START_DATE_OF_NEW_SIN_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Start Date of the new SIN must be entered

message.name: START_DATE_OF_THE_NEW_SIN_MUST_BE_AFTER_END_DATE_OF_AN_EXISTING_SIN
message.locale: Start Date of the New SIN must be after End Date of an existing SIN

message.name: END_DATE_OF_THE_NEW_SIN_MUST_BE_AFTER_START_DATE_OF_THE_NEW_SIN
message.locale: End Date of the New SIN must be after StartDate of the new SIN
